ComicInfo.Summary: Apocalypse Vs. Dracula Part 4: Apocalypse and his allies confront Dracula and the undead members of Clan Akkaba. Apocalypse calls up his army of dark riders to turn the tide of the battle. With most of his followers destroyed, Apocalypse returns to his hibernation while plans are devised to keep the remnants of Clan Akkaba from totally dying out. In the present day, Ozymandias prepares to raise Apocalypse once again.
